inputs.selection_motivation: Gold’s price sensitivity is driven primarily by long‑term rates; the short‑term 2‑year UST link adds minimal incremental insight and is redundant with the 10‑year exposure already present.

prioritized_link.motivation: Gold price moves inversely with European 10‑year gilt yields; a rise in gilt yields signals stronger Euro‑zone rates and reduces safe‑haven demand, directly influencing gold demand.
